name: Nike
description: Designing and deploying scalable cloud infrastructure using public and private cloud technologies such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform.
responsibility: Cloud Engineer: A cloud engineer is responsible for designing, building, and maintaining cloud-based infrastructure and services

name: Netflix
description: A junior engineer is an entry-level position that involves providing support and assistance to senior engineers on various projects.
responsibility: Junior Engineer: A junior engineer is an entry-level position that involves supporting senior engineers on projects, learning new skills, and contributing to software development tasks.

name: Ali Baba
description: Overall, the product manager is responsible for ensuring the success of the product throughout its lifecycle, from ideation to launch to retirement. They are the champion of the product and work to align all stakeholders around the product vision and strategy
responsibility: Developing pricing strategies and product positioning to ensure that the product is competitive in the market

name: Intel
description: Software Engineer: A software engineer develops and maintains computer software, including applications and operating systems. They work with programming languages such as Java, Python, and C++ to write code, test and debug software, and create documentation.
responsibility: Data Engineer: A data engineer is responsible for building and maintaining the infrastructure required to collect, store, process, and analyze large volumes of data
